name: Knight Duel
description:
Defeat the enemy strategically using the fight mechanics of (Attack, Block, Roll Back and Stamina Managment)

The theme of this week was "Vulnerable Invincible", so the when the player is blocking he cannot take damage (Invincible), and after a successful block the opponent is stuned for few seconds (Vulnerable)

The mechanics and the AI of opponent are not 100% polished because I only had 2 days to work in this week, but it was fun implementing them!

Hope you enjoy and thanks for playing!

How to play

  • HOW TO PLAY:
    • WASD or ARROW KEYS - MOVE THE PLAYER
    • DOUBLE TAP LEFT - ROLL BACK
    • MOUSE BUTTON 1 or C - ATTACK
    • MOUSE BUTTON 2 or V - BLOCK
  • ADITIONAL INFO: 
    • USE YOUR STAMINA CAREFULLY 
    • A ROLL NEEDS 20% STAMINA 
    • HOLDING BLOCK DRAINS STAMINA 
    • BLOCK WITH SUCCESS STUN THE ATTACKER

This game was made by johnperes for the Weekly Game Jam 157 with the theme "Vulnerable Invincible".
